metadata.title: CVE-2024-1670 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Mojo in Google Chrome prior to 122.0.6261.57 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
